articles.description: Build-up to seven games including Arsenal v Monaco & Juventus v Manchester City with live text updates, radio commentary and 5 Live Final Score.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Arsenal vs Monaco & Juventus vs Manchester City - scores, radio & text

articles.description: Manchester City's current malaise continues as they are beaten by Juventus to deal a big blow to their hopes of reaching the Champions League knockout stage.
articles.title: Manchester City's Champions League hopes dealt big blow with Juventus loss

articles.description: Bukayo Saka scores twice as Arsenal beat Monaco to leave them in a strong position in the Champions League
articles.title: Arsenal 3-0 Monaco - Bukayo Saka scores twice in victory

articles.description: Saudi Arabia is confirmed as host for the 2034 World Cup, while Spain, Portugal and Morcoco will serve as joint hosts for the 2030 tournament.
articles.title: 2034 Fifa World Cup: Saudi Arabia confirmed as hosts

articles.description: Second-half substitute Ferran Torres scores twice to help Barcelona move up to second in the Champions League table.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-3 Barcelona: Ferran Torres double seals Barca points

articles.description: Follow live text coverage from five games in the Championship, as Sheffield United beat Millwall to go top.
articles.title: Championship LIVE: Follow live text and latest scores from five games

articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Chelsea host Twente in the Women's Champions League.
articles.title: Chelsea vs Twente: UEFA Women's Champions League stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Celtic women's head coach Elena Sadiku says a point against Real Madrid would be nothing more than her players deserve on matchday five of their debut Champions League campaign.
articles.title: Celtic vs Real Madrid: UEFA Women's Champions League live text

articles.description: Tammy Beaumont's unbeaten 65 helps England win a rain-affected third one-day international in Potchefstroom, and seal a 2-1 series win.
articles.title: South Africa vs England: Tammy Beaumont and Amy Jones guide tourists to ODI series win

articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says Dan Ashworth's shock exit is "not the best situation" but believes the club's vision remains clear and unaffected.
articles.title: Manchester United: Dan Ashworth exit 'not best situation' but club vision clear - Ruben Amorim
